plays.text: Penalty to Igor Ulanov 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Bill Muckalt assisted by Jason Marshall and Brad Bombardir
Penalty to Lubomir Sekeras 2 minutes for Tripping Olli Jokinen
Goal scored by Antti Laaksonen unassisted
Penalty to Sandis Ozolinsh 2 minutes for Hooking Pierre-Marc Bouchard
Penalty to Jay Bouwmeester 2 minutes for Holding Andrew Brunette
Goal scored by Brad Bombardir assisted by Marian Gaborik and Pierre-Marc Bouchard
Penalty to Eric Beaudoin 2 minutes for Tripping Pascal Dupuis
Penalty to Pierre-Marc Bouchard 2 minutes for Tripping Marcus Nilson
Penalty to Pierre-Marc Bouchard 2 minutes for Tripping Valeri Bure
Goal scored by Niklas Hagman assisted by Stephen Weiss and Dmitry Yushkevich
Penalty to Bill Muckalt 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Peter Worrell 2 minutes for Roughing Cliff Ronning
Goal scored by Bill Muckalt assisted by Wes Walz
